::DarkMouse::

She looked at her console, pressed a few buttons and looked up at 
Megatron,"Commander, The Allience leader Zardus is currently engaded 
in battle.  He shall speak to you when he is able to talk."
She pressed a few more buttons and checked her monitors. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus' wrist comp beeps as the Alliance base recieves DarkMouse's 
> transmission. Zardus presses several buttons on the comp, hearing 
the message.
> 
> "I am currently engaged in combat," he replies, "I will talk to him 
after the 
> battle."
> 
> He turns back to fire at Kamodia.
